<p align='center'>

```ruby
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⣠⣼⠂⠀⠀⠀⠀⠙⣦⢀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢶⣤⣀⣀⣀⣀⣀⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⣠⣴⣶⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⠷⢦⠀⣹⣶⣿⣦⣿⡘⣇⠀⠀⠀⢰⠾⣿⣿⣿⣟⣻⣿⣿⣿⣷⣦⣄⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⣤⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡟⠀⠀⠀⠀⢺⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢹⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⣦⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⣴⢟⣥⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⢻⣿⣿⡏⢹⣿⣿⣿⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣮⣝⢷⣄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣴⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⢛⣿⣿⣿⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠛⣿⣿⣷⡀⠘⢿⣧⣻⡷⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⣿⣿⣟⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣝⢧⡀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⣾⣿⠟⣡⣾⣿⣿⣧⣿⡿⣋⣴⣿⣿⣿⣿⣧⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢻⣿⣿⣿⣶⡄⠙⠛⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⣝⢻⣿⣟⣿⣿⣷⣮⡙⢿⣽⣆⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⡿⢋⣴⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣼⣯⣾⣿⣿⡿⣻⣿⣿⣿⣦⠀⠀⠀⠀⢀⣹⣿⣿⣿⣿⣶⣤⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣰⣿⣿⣿⣿⠻⣿⣿⣿⣮⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣦⡙⢿⣇⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⣠⡏⣰⣿⣿⡿⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⢋⣼⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⡤⠀⣠⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⣄⠀⢠⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⡜⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⠿⣿⣿⣦⡙⣦⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⣰⢿⣿⣿⠟⠋⣠⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⠛⢡⣾⡿⢻⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⠋⠻⣿⡟⣿⣿⣿⠻⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣟⠻⣿⣆⠙⢿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣦⡈⠻⣿⣿⣟⣧⠀⠀
⠀⣰⢣⣿⡿⠃⣠⡾⠟⠁⠀⣸⣿⡟⠁⢀⣿⠋⢠⣿⡏⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⢿⠁⢀⣠⣴⢿⣷⣿⣿⣿⠀⠀⠽⢻⣿⣿⣿⣿⡼⣿⡇⠈⢿⡆⠀⠻⣿⣧⠀⠈⠙⢿⣆⠈⠻⣿⣎⢧⠀
⠀⢣⣿⠟⢀⡼⠋⠀⠀⢀⣴⠿⠋⠀⠀⣾⡟⠀⢸⣿⠙⣿⠃⠘⢿⡟⠀⣰⢻⠟⠻⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣀⠀⠀⠘⣿⠋⠀⣿⡇⣿⡇⠀⠸⣿⡄⠀⠈⠻⣷⣄⠀⠀⠙⢷⡀⠙⣿⣆⠁
⢀⣿⡏⠀⡞⠁⢀⡠⠞⠋⠁⠀⠀⠀⠈⠉⠀⠀⠀⠿⠀⠈⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⣿⣰⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣤⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠉⠀⠸⠃⠀⠀⠈⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠙⠳⢤⣀⠀⠹⡄⠘⣿⡄
⣸⡟⠀⣰⣿⠟⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠛⠿⠿⠿⠟⠁⠀⠹⣿⣷⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠻⣿⣧⠀⢹⣷
⣿⠃⢠⡿⠃⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢠⣄⣤⣀⠀⠀⣿⣿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⢻⡇⠀⣿
⣿⠀⢸⠅⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣰⡿⠋⠉⢻⣧⢀⣿⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⠀⢸
⡇⠀⠈⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢿⣧⡀⠀⠀⣿⣾⡟⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠀⢸
⢸⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠻⠿⣿⣿⠟⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⡾
⠈⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣰⡿⠋⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠃
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢰⡏⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠘⣧⢀⣾⣤⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣀⡼⣿⣿⣾⣤⣠⡼⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

----]  Hiya, I am `heapsoverflow`. And certainly, heaps do overflow.

--] Reverse Engineering Enthusiast.
--] Computer Science Major.
--] Open Source Advocate.
--] Currently working on binary obfuscation and game modding.
```
